column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Elijah - Thank you very much for the 5-star review. We truly appreciate your kind words
column2: and I am proud to call you a "JINYA Regular." We appreciate your understanding regarding our misstep with your recent to-go order. I am sending you a private message that will hopefully sort it out. Thank you again
column3: and we look forward to your next visit.
